name: Sweet Tycoon
description:
Become a Sweet Tycoon - Trade sweets, cakes and everything delicious and tasty.

Purchase your sweets at there lowest price and sell high! - Watch out, the price can go down as well as up.


----------------------------------------
3 game modes to choose from -
----------------------------------------

Career - Build a reputation trading sweets to become the worlds best Sweet Tycoon.

Time Trial - Work against the clock to beat the mission.

Endless - Play freely, trading sweets, cakes and biscuits to make a huge fortune.

----------------------------------------

Do you have what it takes to become the worlds richest Sweet Tycoon?
